code projects

Cubic - aesthetically productive algorithm

about

An application named Cubic was developed as a term project of Visual creativity informatics at Faculty of Informatics Masaryk University. The main goal of the term project was to design and implement an aesthetically productive algorithm.

The idea for the algorithm arose from my hand-sketched lines which were typically a byproduct of thinking (or boredom) during lectures. The generation of a single line was implemented in a way that was simulating real sketches created on a paper but the application also allowed to add colours and other different properties to expand possible visual outputs.

developed for

term project of Visual creativity informatics in The Studio of Graphic Design and Multimedia

contribution

design, code

technologies used

Java SE 6

design & code by lucyia
